author: Kenneth R. Rosen
title: My Bulletproof Vest and the Illusion of Perfect Protection
description: I once bought it to keep me safe from gunfire, but these days, what would keep me safe from other people?
content: When I interviewed civilians struggling to rebuild their homes, in Mosul and in Northeastern Syria, I would ask if they had hope for the future. They told me ISIS was gone, things were getting better, and I wrote that down. They were lifting the remains of a … [+3813 chars]
